com.att.research.xacml.std.pep

Class StdEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.std.pep.StdEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PEPEngine

    public class StdEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements PEPEngine
    StdEngine implements the PEPEngine interface by creating an instance of the PDPEngine interface using the PDPEngineFactory and passing requests through to that engine, forwarding the Response object back to the caller.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response decide(Request pepRequest)
      Instantiates a Policy Decision Point (PDP) to evaluate the given Request using its Policy Sets to determine if the given Request is allowed.
